website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and fun bath toys that are great for babies and toddlers.
pros: Includes 3 squirt toys: Ariel, Flounder, and Sebastian
All toys are BPA free and are easy for small hands to hold
The toys also float in water as well, making them fun for pools, baths, and beach time
cons: Must squeeze out all water and let dry completely to avoid mold growth inside the toys

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys but get moldy inside
customer_reviews.text: This is what came out of them. Even if you squeeze out all the water after every bath, there are still moisture left inside. I would recommend buying the non squirting ones if you don't want your little one biting moldy bath toys. Other than that, they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: YT

customer_reviews.title: Dory
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little bath squirters. If you want them to last longer, convert them to non-squirting toys by using hot glue to seal the holes. That will make them so they float and can be played with in the tub, but won’t mold on the inside, as squirting toys tend to do. They came in a little mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Moldy
customer_reviews.text: Had these for couple months, grandson played with them in tub. Well noticed black specks came out when we played so I cut one open and full of mold
customer_reviews.author: Laura Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these . Unfortunately, today during bathtime I squirted Doris and a huge chunk of black mold came out! I am horrified!. We always made sure to remove all the water from them and stored them facing down so any remnants of water would fall off. I am so upset about this, my son chewed on these things a lot. I would not recommend them. Buy the solid ones for a safer option. We have only had these for 2 months :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: I bout this set because I plan on using Ariel as a cake topper. It's the perfect size and I think it will work great! I gave Sebastian and flounder to my 6 month old daughter to play with and she loves eating on them so it worked out great for me. I will update this with a photo of the cake after I finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nemo and friends. Big hit.
customer_reviews.text: I have many bathtub toys I've collected and used w my children and grandchildren. These 3 characters from Finding Nemo are particularly fun because they're have happy faces, they're oversized, soft, colorful and they bring the ocean in the tub. Play, learn n smile! 12/14/16. Still enjoying these!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bath toys, but i'm not kidding, Dory constantly gets lost in the bubbles. They fill up with water very slowly so you have to patient, but otherwise no complaints. My son adores them, he plays with them in the bath, in his water table and even takes them to bed. I'm sure they'd get moldy inside after a while but i rinse all his squirty toys out with some hot water and baking soda and it seems to help with the issue.
customer_reviews.author: TodiM

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves these squirting toys, especially he aims them at his family!
customer_reviews.text: He loves to get people wet, usually by spitting, drooling, or blowing raspberries. But these Finding Nemo/Dory toys squirt water at you when the bath water's clean, and he loves to splash water in tubs AND pools! These were a birthday present for him. Even my wacky 8- and 14-year-old nieces love to have water gun fights in the house with these squirting toys, but they thankfully hadn't done that for many months now! Squirt safely with any water toy, and don't fight in the house with them!
customer_reviews.author: ToonXpert87

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adults too! My only complain is Dory & Nemo don’t stay on their belly’s. They only float on their sides. UPDATE.... Because I keep mine in my hot tub which has chlorinated water, I have not had an issue with any mold whatsoever. Those of you that are having that issue, maybe try rinsing with bleach water after use before letting air dry??? I’m glad I don’t have that problem cuz these are way too cute to cut up and throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the finding Nemo squirt toys as stocking stuffers for my 11 month old and she went crazy for them. She really likes fish so I knew she would enjoy these. The toys are made surprisingly well, they look just like the characters. These are her new favorite bath toys. If you’re looking for some cheap toys for bath time I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Princess Lover’s Best Bath Toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for bath time for my Princess loving little. I always hot glue the holes in bath squeeze toys!! It ensures they last longer and don’t get moldy. Especially important for these since they are more unique and special. Plus, sometimes toys like this like to be taken out to play with outside the tub and it means no water gets sprayed around the home! The size of these are great! They are larger than Little People, but comparable in size to typical rubber bath squeeze toys-maybe even a little larger. The only downside is Ariel’s hair is a little more pinkish rather than red. Great quality and so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great toys just keep them clean
customer_reviews.text: Keep them clean. If not they will mold on the inside because they do have holes to squirt from. We use a watered down bleach solution followed by plain water to keep them clean. Going strong and minimal mold.
customer_reviews.author: Bpuc

customer_reviews.title: Ariel Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, and I was really disappointed with Ariel, because she looks like she was left out in the sun. Her hair is PINK! Her clothing is also washed out. Flounder and Sebastian look fine, but Ariel looks like she is a knockoff. I was hoping to attach a picture to this review, but the child I purchased them for is too young to care and hasn't let go of them since I gave them to him. That is the reason I didn't give them a one star rating. While I am disappointed in the results, he hugs all three close to himself as this is currently his favorite movie.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: Baby Grandson loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are great tub toys and he loved them. Kept him occupied for almost the prune stage. Each little Character spewed water bubbles except the Dory. Dory however, was easy for him to hole. He is 9 months old. I pop them in the dishwasher and they steam dry and are ready to go. No safety issues as far as I can tell. They also look cute in a little basket with rolled washcloths. Pop them inside with their eyes up and they look adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: perfect colors and no mold after almost two years
customer_reviews.text: After two ears of using this product, which didn't lose fade or lose color or any part. under usage within pools hot water soapy water, traveled with us to several countries. So I decided it's time to check for mold, (Since our to is more into Dori now ) I cut Nemo open (even though it still looks brand new). surprisingly it was clean as new with nothing inside it. I even opened to the fin to check but still nothing. I will be buying replacement for sure. Yes we washed it after every use and hung it to dry, but we did the same with sophie, but still had mold smell.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little toys! My son is obsessed with the turtle (Squirt), to the point where "turtle" was his third word. He loves chewing on all of them, but especially on the turtle's fins. This is our second time buying, because we let them go into the bath and Nemo got moldy inside. Note: As with any of these little rubber toys, they will get moldy if you submerge them in water over and over and do not clean them properly. This time I will be more vigilant at cleaning them with a water and vinegar solutiom after they go into the bath tub!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Preschoolers.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as swim toys for my preschool swim lesson students. They are easy for their hands to grasp and they get so excited when they get to have water adventures with these 3 friends. I bought an extra set so that I can keep a set at work and a set in my supplies that I have outside of work. Both boys and girls seem to love playing with these. If you teach swim lessons or just want to make bath time fun, I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Mold!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these toys but after reading many of the reviews on here we cut hers open and it was full of mold. We thoroughly squeezed the water out after every bath time and let dry. There is just no way to keep these toys from growing mold. If you get these, I would recommend replacing frequently. Sad we had to throw ours in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fun product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun alternative from your typical runner duck. They float and squirt out water. I don't agree with the 1 star reviews. The product getting moldy is not the fault of manufacturer. As all surfaces do..when you expose something to water it will develop mold if you don't clean it. That means you should fill with clean soapy water, rinse, and leave to dry. Would have given 5 stars but Nemo did not float right side up and it annoyed my son.
customer_reviews.author: Ajo Lonzo

customer_reviews.title: Cute but impossible to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: These little toys are cute. But 4 months in and the painted plastic is already cracking, removing a star. They also accumulate a lot of water easily and it’s impossible to squeeze all the water out. That’s the second star removal. I squirt mold out of them every night because I can’t seem to empty them completely. They’re super cute, and my baby loves to kick them around, but they’re impossible to keep clean and sadly Pluto’s white plastic is already cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Mold inside!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these toys for 2 months. I cut one open and it has mold!!! So every time the baby squirts it, it's spreading moldy water all over the bathtub. This is especially dangerous for a baby or toddler. If this mold water sprays their eyes they can get an eye infection. NOT SAFE. I love Disney and I love Nemo but they should recall toys like these that cannot be properly cleaned inside.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: These are great little bath toys for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: These are great little bath toys for the little ones. The only problem with squirt toys is that you have to be sure to get all the water out after the bath or playtime so that they don't mildew inside. I try to remember to rinse them out with cold water and squeeze all the water out leaving them to drain between baths. The little ones love these colorful Disney bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: Jone

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys
customer_reviews.text: My child is obsessed with Finding Dory and I found these for bath time. She really likes them and loves to squirt them. They are well made and are made of thicker material so they should last. The Dory toy is hard to fill with water but the others fill easily. My only concern long term is keeping them mold free. This is a challenge for any toy that hold water though. May have to fill them with bleach water occasionally (low concentration) and let them sit and wash them out.
customer_reviews.author: JeronimoHIllam

customer_reviews.title: Tossed them in the garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and after 6 months they were moldy and gross inside and that led to moldy and gross water squirted into the tub. Tossed them in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved them.
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved them... really nice... I can foresee them having mold issues over time but at this price point they are really nice and if push comes to shove, you can cheaply replace them... Edit: Indeed got some sort of grime or mold on the inside... Threw them out and replaced them ☺ If my review helped you in any way, please let me know by clicking the "helpful" button below. Any questions you may have, feel free to ask... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Colors are a little off but otherwise cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the little mermaid set for my daughter. She’s 9 months old. They’re durable enough for her to chew on without puncturing. We will probably glue the holes shut to avoid mold so they can’t be used as bath squirties, but they’ll still float and be cute! My only complaint is the color is a little off. Flounder and Sebastian are brightly colored, but Ariel looks very faded, like she was left out in the sun. Her hair is almost pink and all the other colors on her are pastel. Other than that, great set. My daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fans of Disney's Nemo!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a the birthday of Disney's number one fan! He loves Nemo and Dory! The toys are well made, they squirt perfectly, and they've lasted long!
customer_reviews.author: *Pearl

customer_reviews.title: I got them for the fish to go with a larger Ariel toy.
customer_reviews.text: The Flounder and Sebastian are the perfect size to go with a hand-me-down Arial bath toy/doll that we already have. It comes with a little Ariel that I will save for future "mermaid' birthdays. (multiple girls in this house). It's a shame you can't get a set with a larger Arial-she's the same size as the crab & fish.
customer_reviews.author: Some Kid's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Totally the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The colors are a real disappointment. The Little Mermaid's hair is a flamingo color and flounder was barely yellow. Sebastian was the only one that looked good. I sent it back and reordered it. I thought maybe it was just a bad batch..... some people had received really nice ones.... nope... got a second set that looked exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson’s bath time. He loves to play with them in the tub. They are durable and easy to keep clean. The only reason for my giving it 4 stars is I thought the bath toys were not as bright in color as in the picture. I found the orange in Nemo and blue in Dori was dull in color. Otherwise, fun toys for the bath.
customer_reviews.author: elkton girl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add to a baby gift, so I cannot comment on how well they hold up or whether baby likes them. But they are very cute, the colors are bright and bold, and they appeared to be well made. I am sure they float just fine and I cannot imagine a baby, toddler, small child NOT liking them.
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGood

customer_reviews.title: Mold :(
customer_reviews.text: I know all squirty toys are subject to mold, but DARN! These are so cute and tons of fun. We'd try to dry them out as best as we could - plus we live in a dry area, but sure enough, we found mold in Nemo.... had to "flush" him down the drain because he died. No more squirty toys for bath time. I think Dad is more sad about this than little guy.
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown. Good bath time distracters.
customer_reviews.text: They look exactly like the picture. They have a little hole to suck in and spit out water when squeezed. They are a good size, no real choking possibility. They are strong and durable, no chipping or paint or plastic coming off. My sons plays with these in his tub and our small pool. he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: InnocentBystander

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Used these bath toys for my daughter, after one use there was mold spitting out of the mouth of them. Not a good bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loved them
customer_reviews.text: When we bought these we felt bad, because they were so small and cheap. These were a suggestion for a 2 year olds birthday. Once she opened these, she walked around with them in her hand the rest of the party. I’d say they were a hit with her, and mom says she hasn’t put them down since she got them. The gift card didn’t matter, but these did. They may be cheap, but these were the best to a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell W

customer_reviews.title: Crud collects inside that can get in baby's mouth
customer_reviews.text: The hole on these Nemo bath toys is not big enough to air out after bath. As a consequence, they get cruddy inside frequently, like every 2 days. We bathe our baby every night and I've noticed that a gross, gooey, brown, filmy booger-looking thing comes out 9 out of 10 times I squeeze the water out. My baby likes to squeeze and swallow the water so this is a major problem. She has ducks from a different maker that have bigger holes and do not ever seem to have this problem. Do not recommend, as I'll be throwing them out now (baby is 10 months old).
customer_reviews.author: GolfMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about these bath toys. The package came on time as expected. The quality of the toys were not very good. The paint was off on the eyes, they just looked creepy. I wouldn’t purchase them again. I would provide a picture but my dog decided that they looked like her toys and crewed them right up.
customer_reviews.author: Momma❤️Deals

customer_reviews.title: Keep them out of the bath!
customer_reviews.text: These come pretty much exactly as pictured and they are a good size too. I was afraid that the Ariel toy would have odd facial features but she's actually cute. I know these are meant to be used in the bath but I don't plan on these being submerged in water ever. They suck in and squirt out water but there's no way to completely dry them on the inside so they wind up developing MOLD. My 9 month old loves playing with them, just not in the bath!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathtime
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old loves to play with these toys and loves the ball most of all. They do have holes and squirt water so after we’re done I make sure to squirt all of the water out to eliminate mold/mildew. The colors haven’t faded and they tots are soft enough for her to bite on.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with but has some minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys playing with these during bath time but it takes some work to fill them; she's only 1 so I have to fill them for her. I also make sure to squeeze all the water out after bath time to reduce the likelihood for mold. When not filled the fish float on their side and the turtle floats upside down like dead fish, LoL. She doesn't realize it but something to think about if it concerns you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit. They will squirt water, but also air. She wanted us to keep puffing her with air from the toys. Delightful! They are the right size for little fingers and hands. The colors are not as bright as I anticipated them to be, but overall a great gift at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Trouble at first but great item
customer_reviews.text: First shipment arrived after a week of delayed and a replacement had arrived it was an empty bag then later got an email saying it was returned very confused on that The items themselves were cute and our little girl loves them harder than expected but thats better and very happy with that
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect distraction for my little one
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe in keeping toys at bath tube before until I had a son who is hard to keep him sitting so toys will keep him distracted for me to give him a bath. As a Disney family we love them. Bright colors and very well made. Perfect size for my 8 month old. The only negative thing is they tend to flip upside down. It’s because most of the weight it’s on top but that wouldn’t prevent me from buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasantly dull colors.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these was great except for the coloration which was strangely dull and slightly unpleasant. They look like they had a coating of dirt and Grime on them but it was the pigmentation of the plastic. Maybe this was just a bad batch but I can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile toys
customer_reviews.text: Can be used in the bathtub or in the pool. We clean weekly by filling each toy with dilute bleach solution and rinsing a few times. The castle has to be shaken a few times to get all of the water out. But it's a favourite among the many toys and very easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: They don't really suck up water or "squirt" well. But they float.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a water toy that will soak up water and squirt easily for play, this isn't the best. Doesn't suck up enough water to squirt without having to hold it upside down to squirt what little water goes in, out. They still float, and my son is still enjoying them. But he also likes to squirt bath toys, so... mostly a fail on that part for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Mold develops after a few months of use and pollutes the bath water
customer_reviews.text: I started to notice little black flecks floating in the water after a few months of use. Similar to others, I always squirted the water out of the toys after bath time. However, this didn't stop the mold that others have noted from forming. I will not be buying squirting bath toys in the future. Shame, because my son loved these.
customer_reviews.author: bongo

customer_reviews.title: Calling all mermaid fans
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so happy when we got her these for Christmas! They were a good quality rubber (great for kids of all ages) and the perfect choice for any little mermaid fans out there! They were a little pricey for how many toys you get, but they were so nice it didn't even bother me! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Let kids live it but don’t use as a bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Like: My kid loves the bright colors of Finding Nemo set and I see how kids face lights up on seeing the toys. Dislike: these are not squirt toys because as many people have pointed out, they stay wet despite squirting all the water out and will form mold.
customer_reviews.author: Sash

customer_reviews.title: Ariel doesnt look like Ariel
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail today Sebastian and Flounder look great, just like they should but Ariel looks like a nock off mermaid. Her coloring is faded compared to the crab and fish and she just doesnt look like in the picture like Ariel
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Devery

customer_reviews.title: Pastel Ariel?
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute but for some reason Ariel is pastel colored while Flounder and Sebastian are normal colored? It’s a little off bc she has pink hair instead of her regular red. But other than that they’re fine. Won’t be hanging onto them long if it starts to mold though.
customer_reviews.author: NoRestForTheWicked

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys But Grew Mold Inside
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She loves to chew on them and put them in her mouth. I always made sure all the water was drained from them and stored them face down to make sure they didn’t grow mold but they still did. It was recommended to hot glue the hole to solve that problem. I will purchase again and try that because my 8 month daughter loved these toys. She prefers to chew on them and doesn’t squirt them.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Tub
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Whale of a Tub for our new grandson, I also purchased the Nemo squirt toys. He loves to be squirted by them and wants to play before he attempts to go to sleep in the water. These bath toys are wonderful, fun, easy to clean and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good bath toys for kids💖
customer_reviews.text: These aquatic Disney characters make bath time more fun for the little ones. Ariel Flounder Sebastian. I just happened to purchase a gift my friend had on her saves list . Needless to say she was happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Amore

customer_reviews.title: Fun but retain water
customer_reviews.text: Pros - fun to play with in the bath. They fill with water then you can make bubbles by squeezing the water out - three fish in different shapes and colors Cons - it’s really difficult to get all of the water out at the end of a bath leading to stale water pooling inside the fish
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use these as bath toys, I use them for play and teething. They are just the right size for little hands to grasp. Rubber is soft and thick and colors are vibrant. My grandson loves them. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mean

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Really fun bath toys for young children to enjoy bath time. In a very easy to play with size. The disney theme is very cute & fun. My grandson is so enjoying these bathtoys. Anything that makes bath time easier is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Hassel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Topper Too!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our 4 year olds bday cake. Oddly, on Amazon, there's hardly any Little Mermaid cake toppers. So we improvised, and it worked out. Bonus, they're also really great toys. Her and her friends played with them after she blew out the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Eshe

customer_reviews.title: Standard bath toy
customer_reviews.text: These hold up well and my daughter has loved them from the time she was 6 months (currently 1 1/2). I did purchase them twice. As with most bath toys, they get pretty grimey and there are a lot of small crevices to clean. I typically just toss and replace.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! I got a set of each, both Nemo and the Little Mermaid, and they are staples in her bath! I love the colors, and as another review mentioned, the placement of the squirt holes were well thought of, such as the hole in the flower on Ariel. She is a little more pastel color, but still very pretty and looks true to character. We have had them a while now, and there is no mold still!
customer_reviews.author: T F

customer_reviews.title: Great cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to use as a cake topper for my daughters finding Nemo themed birthday party. They came out great! I am especially happy she gets to use them as a bath toys also. She’s so excited to play with them every night now. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KristArt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these toys so much. We don’t let her have the ball since it’s too small but she loves Puppy Dog Pals and loves playing with these more than her other toys. She’s always walking around with them haha!
customer_reviews.author: serpentor

customer_reviews.title: Material is little harder then I would like
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my one year old niece they're hard for me to squeeze the materials just harder than I would like for toys like this for little kids but I don't think they're going to rip her break so it looks like they're made well
customer_reviews.author: kimberlynn franz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Got these to put on top of my sons cake for his first birthday instead of tiny things he can't play with or things I would throw out. He will be having a puppy dog pals party and will love these
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath time toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nine-month-old grandson who loves his baths and likes to sit and play in the water. They're a little bit smaller that I anticipated, which is why I gave them four stars, but the quality is very good. They're cute and above all, my grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Aida E. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The dang turtle
customer_reviews.text: First of all you can’t clean the insides of these things where mold grows, second of all I wouldn’t give this as a teether because of the fact mold can grow in it and thirdly the turtle, the dang turtle. You have to hold the turtle upside down to get it to squirt.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtime fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my sons favorite bath toys. We have many conversations between Dory and Nemo swimming in the tub. I do suggest replacing these every once in a while as as they will grow mold.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as part of my nephew's 2nd birthday gift. Being bath toys, I didn't have high expectations, but when they arrived, I was shocked by the awesome quality of the paint job and the durability of the toys. I would gladly repurchase these as future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: jncweller

customer_reviews.title: Not fun for babies that are teething.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little toy it is exactly what they say. It is except. , it's not usable to just play with for babies that are teething. It's too hard. Hard plastic. Not fun for baby. Now I have not used it in the bathtub. . But it will be the same thing. Hard plastic can actually hurt a baby's gums if they come up on it too hard. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: daniel creighton

customer_reviews.title: Nemo should be ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute set... I used it to decorate a birthday cake. My only complaint is Nemo is not a nice dark orange and appeared more faded. The size was fine and here weren't any defects.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Laudati

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson, he love to play with them. He went through this period where they weren’t allowed in the tub (all the toys). So I know they can take being tossed out of the tub a hundred times or so with out any issues. Super cute, look like the oictires. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my infant daughter loves them. Unfortunately due to their shape the "Nemo" is the only one that functions well for squirting water. Because of that I would rather them not have the hole at all so there isn't potential for mold growth.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size for his little hands to grab but not ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I ordered these for my 1 year old nephew for Christmas. Even during the busy Christmas season they ended up arriving at my house 2 days before the scheduled time. They are the perfect size for his little hands to grab but not two small that you really have to worry about him chocking on them. Granted you might still want to watch them play in the bathtub until they know not to chew on them. They are very durable and make a great alternate to many other bath toys. They are great to play with beyond a toddler as they are fun to watch float in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Beware if using as cake toppers..
customer_reviews.text: Used for my grand-daughter's Little Mermaid cake. Served it's purpose but just like alot of other reviews say, Ariel's hair is not red but PINK. Not an almost red pink, but it's pink. It ruined the cake so i took out some red paint and a very small paintbrush and made it red.
customer_reviews.author: Ladydee

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 months old. It's very cute amd Really like the movie but because it's squeezing water it's hard to clean it well and also the fish it's kinda thin. If don’t mind this would be good gift for ur little one.
customer_reviews.author: Greycap

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The three characters are different squeezabilities, which is great for different baby ages. My only disappointment is that the orange nemo is a dull orange, which is different than picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gifted these at Christmas time to my cousin for her son (a year). I can tell you they were played with that very evening and have been used several times since then. The four-year-old also seems to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: fun for pool or bath, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bath toys, my daughters love little mermaid so they are played with a lot. Definitely better for the younger crowd (2 year old loves, 4 year old doesn’t play with them much).
customer_reviews.author: goldenugget

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to rinse them after bath time, they will develop mold inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Toys!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year old even though they say 6 months+. We use these for " water shooters" during target practice with another bath toy we bought to teach the ABCs. The squirters that came with that toy were a little small and not holding enough water for our game. My toddler loves playing "Finding Nemo" in the bath anyways so these were a great toy for her. They are easy to fill, squeeze, and hold. Great colors.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bath Toys
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and great quality. Good for gifting. Baby can try to chew but these toys are a bit too fat in shape I feel. They are fun for bath time. Fill up w water and squirt away! My little 4mth old Neice loves looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great at cake toppers and toys
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my daughters birthday cake. She wanted a mermaid cake for the beach and they were great for the pool at the resort too. Even my baby nephew loves to chew on them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria t

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and my girl loves them. I opened them as soon as they came and she didn't want to wait for a bath to play with them. They smelt a little weird at first but after being disinfected they are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Niah

customer_reviews.title: They end up moldy.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to love these bath toys because they are so cute, easy to hold for babies, and my son loved them. However, even after making sure to squirt all the water out after each bath, each toy ended up moldy on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, we got her these and the Mickey set. The only thing that bothers me just a little is that Minnie and the sand castle don’t stay upright when they’re floating on the water. But that’s tiny and my daughter really likes playing with them in the bath!
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but not Disney quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for bath time for our 1 year old. They came out of the package with a harsh chemical smell and when we use them in the bath they flip over so you can’t even see Mickey or Pluto floating around with you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Product is durable and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my 6 month old son to try and make bath time more fun. He now plays with it at bath time instead of crying. Product is durable and fun. Bath time is more pleasant now.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but not what  is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Good for price but definitely cheaply made. The coloring on the Ariel was wierd: pink hair and mint colored tail but for the price, you get what you pay for. Wouldn't buy as a gift but it's not bad for a bath toy that only lasts a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheaply made but does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller that expected (then again I didn't read the measurements ahead of time) paint wasn’t lined up on the toy, just not the best quality but they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Goode Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toys! Had since Dec.’18 & still no mold
customer_reviews.text: I believe I ordered this for my LO for Christmas 2018. I have made it a habit to squeeze all of the water out of the squishies after every bath ...although... I do every now and then forget about them until the day after :O I have yet to see any mold come out of these Nemo bath toys though! ***I still have these bath toys which are still clean with no mold.
customer_reviews.author: Estes Fam

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this product because is super hard to take the water from inside the toy and it grows mold very easily on the inside, very dangerous for children.
customer_reviews.author: Josefsara

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 month old baby and she loves them! Recognizable, fun characters and bright, bold colors. Little challenging to keep bath toys clean, but she does like chewing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mom

customer_reviews.title: bought these for stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: who would have thought these would be such a hit for my grand daughters. I put them in their stockings (12 month old and 9 month old) and theyre still playing with them. They are also great for bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute but afraid of mold developing inside
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute bath toys and my son loves to chew on them, only wish that would have had no holes in them or the holes on the bottom so I could close it up. Just don't want mold to develop in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley M. Bojarski

customer_reviews.title: Really cute! Makes great fan pull too!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! I used mine to create fan pulls since I couldn't find cute Nemo fan pulls and now my grandson just wants to be lifted to the ceiling fan all the time to see them! (Make a slice along the top (about 1 1/2") and push in old gold ball that was on the chain and super glue rubber back together! Easy Peasie!)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Stark

customer_reviews.title: Nemo works best
customer_reviews.text: Love Disney and got these for our grandson. Due to slim design/way they are made the turtle and Dory are the hardest to fill. Nemo works every time. Our grandson loves them and at 21 months has figured out how to fill them and wants to play with them during bathtime.
customer_reviews.author: GFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but hold water and get really moldy inside if not squeezed dry after each use. I thought I was squeezing all of the water out but apparently not, as several times after, i squeezed and black chunks came out. It was more trouble than it was worth, so they got tossed
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sabatini

customer_reviews.title: Great tub toys
customer_reviews.text: In addition to being great for teething they make wonderful tub toys, although at 3-months he can’t really squirt them yet. He seems to love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fun bath toys; however nearly impossible to clean the inside.We had to throw ours away after about 6 months as they were growing some yucky green stuff inside that would come out every time you squirt them. Couldn’t get it out as the opening is so small.
customer_reviews.author: JK13

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and my two year old loved them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are large enough for a toddler/older child's hand! I was expecting them to be much smaller than they were when they arrived. Great quality, and my two year old loved them so much they are now wandering around the house despite my pleas that "fishes live in tubs!" Toddler one, mom zero. But yes, these are worth buying. Maybe yours will stay in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

product_meta.title: The First Years Disney Baby Bath Squirt Toys, The Little Mermaid
product_meta.description: Style:The Little MermaidWhat could be more fun for little bathers than hanging in the tub with their favorite Disney friends? Each of the toys in the Disney Squirt Toys 3-Packs is cute, colorful, and perfectly compact for little hands. Kids will love the squirting action and playing in the tub with The Little Mermaid characters..
feature_bullets: Toys squirt water for bath time fun
Includes Ariel, Flounder, and Sebastian squirt toys
Toys squirt water for bathtime fun
Includes Ariel, flounder, and Sebastian squirt toys

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars7,812 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
